__e: What, that a very wealthy man's daughter might be why I now have to eat coal dust for the next God knows how long?
I feel so stupid that I don't understand why I can't make carbon copies of your letters.
More coal for me, bit of useful cash for you on your journey.
If this building has a heart, it's black as the ace of spades, and you're sleeping in it.
More than coal dust and childbirth... and men who think saying I love you is enough.
Well, one thing you got to remember about these coal people, and I told this to your daddy, too, they got one job on this earth and that's stealing the sun.
